column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health on the morning
column7: stating 7 new cases of COVID-19 had been detected and 7 other patients had recovered.------The seven newly identified patients were all Cambodian men
column8: including four from the United Nations Peacekeeping forces and the United Nations and group of 3 passengers who had come from Indonesia.------ This brings the number of detected to 231
